item.title: Introducing open-source freeloader Novacut
item.description: Give us 25,000 USD and we will write amazing cloud-enabled open-source video editor for you. Is this a dream, or reality? There is such a huge lack of full-featured video editor in Linux. We all know it. But rather then building new Adobe Premiere replacement for Linux, it is maybe better to define new approach. Everything is going into the cloud today. We read emails, chat, edit pictures. Wait! Edit pictures?
